site.name: KC Services
site.description: Expert bookkeeping and financial management services that give you the freedom to focus on what you do best running your business.

services.title: Ongoing Bookkeeping
services.description: Regular maintenance of your financial records, ensuring accuracy and compliance throughout the year.

services.title: AR/AP Management
services.description: Complete accounts receivable and payable management to maintain healthy cash flow and vendor relationships.

services.title: Invoice/Bill Creation
services.description: Professional invoice generation and bill processing to streamline your payment cycles.

services.title: Accounts Reconciliation
services.description: Monthly reconciliation of all accounts to catch discrepancies early and maintain accuracy.

services.title: Financial Prep
services.description: Comprehensive financial statements and reports that give you clear insights into your business health.

pricing.subtitle: Day-to-day availability or long-term without breaking the bank.
For needs that aren't day-to-day ‚Äî a project here and there.
One-time project or hands-on help for a few tasks this month.

testimonials.text: She's extremely knowledgeable and doesn't make you feel inferior with your questions. I got a sense that she genuinely cared about the wellbeing of my business which is rare to find.
testimonials.author: Evelyn L.

testimonials.text: She helped us get our books in order in record time. Our cash flow clarity improved dramatically within the first month.
testimonials.author: Mike A.
